csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name and="text"/>
          <institution/>
        </names>
        <choose>
          <if is-plural="author">
            <text value="are plural"/>
          </if>
          <else>
            <text value="is singular"/>
          </else>
        </choose>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
result: Richard Noakes is singular; John Doe and Jane Roe are plural; Jane Roe with Big Co. are plural; Jane Roe, Big Co. is singular
